scripts.server:build: echo 'Full build (first time or after clean)...' && cmake -S server -B server/build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cmake --build server/build --config Release --parallel
scripts.server:clean: echo 'Cleaning build (keeps deps cache)...' && rm -rf server/build
scripts.server:run: pnpm run server:run:linux || pnpm run server:run:windows
scripts.dev:local: turbo run dev --filter webview & pnpm server:run
